activities.description: Practice constructing a presentation outline on a specific machine learning algorithm (e.g., Support Vector Machines).  The AI assistant will provide feedback on logical flow and clarity of language.  Focus on concise, clear language and technical terms related to machine learning.
Deliver a mock presentation to an AI assistant, receiving immediate feedback on pronunciation, pace, and use of technical vocabulary.  The AI can simulate a virtual audience.

Engage in a simulated debate with the AI assistant on a machine learning concept (e.g., deep learning vs. traditional methods).  Practice formulating arguments and rebuttals, focusing on respectful and effective communication in Chinese. The AI will analyze argument structure, logic, and language use.
Review and expand vocabulary related to machine learning concepts and debate strategies. The AI assistant can provide definitions, example sentences, and synonyms for technical terms.

Use an AI-simulated scenario where you need to explain the use of a specific machine learning tool or algorithm. This requires applying your learned vocabulary and debate strategies in a problem-solving discussion context. The AI provides scenarios and prompts.  Focus on concise, clear explanations and solutions.

Participate in an AI-simulated discussion about a machine learning project. You are required to contribute to the conversation, summarizing past learnings and discussing potential issues. The AI assistant guides the discussion.
Revise a previous presentation based on AI feedback. Pay attention to clarity, grammar, and vocabulary. Practice delivering the revised presentation again, and get refined feedback.
Review and expand vocabulary related to advanced machine learning concepts.  The AI assistant provides a quiz to test comprehension.
Refine your debating skills in an AI-assisted format.  Focus on counterarguments and adapting to different perspectives in the Chinese language.  The AI will help track your progress.

Reflect on your presentation and debate performance from the week.  Set specific goals and objectives for future learning, focusing on further development of your Chinese technical communication skills.
Complete a vocabulary quiz covering technical machine learning terms in Chinese. The AI will provide immediate feedback and further study materials based on your answers.
Engage in a conversational practice with the AI assistant on the week's learnings, practicing informal Chinese communication.
Reflect on the week's learning and identify areas for further improvement. The AI assistant provides a summary of your progress and personalized suggestions.
Start planning for next week's topics. Review the concepts from past lessons to keep the learning momentum.
